ing: 1/2 fluid ounce creme de cassis liqueur
des: "This take on Sex on the Beach makes a great party drink, good for ordering at a club, or just for fun."
ins: Pour the vodka, peach schnapps, creme de cassis, orange juice, and cranberry juice into a cocktail shaker over ice. Cover, and shake until the outside of the shaker has frosted. Strain into a chilled martini glass, and garnish with orange and cherries to serve.
